column5: Happy 4th, Independence Day, to all my American friends. Have a great day with family. I hope the weather holds out for your outdoor festivities.

Thank you sir...........some little know facts.........   Today is our 4th of JULY...our nation is one year older....   Did you know that they even have a 4th of JULY in RUSSIA...........not kidding at all.......same with Iran, North Korea, and China......why even in remote parts of the GREAT WHITE NORTH....better known as CANADA there is a fourth of JULY.................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................Don't believe me.........just go check your calendar today.......see you have a 4th of JULY on it............   The WHOLE WORLD celebrates our nations birthday...........................NOW THAT'S POWER.......   :devil:    :devil:
Nice of you me brudder, to think of our friends southern of the boarder.  Hope you all had a great day,even with the fury of the hand of mother nature.  Live ,love and Cherish .
YES SIR..........the BEST there is.......  and we love our faithful Canadian cousins too.......never fear...we are you FRIENDS...
Good thing the Bible says to love thy neighbour, otherwise you guys wouldn't have too many friends!      And yes that's neighbour, with a u.
Errrrrrrrrrrr.......no.........you would now be a American....LOL....
A lot of Americans think we are!
Ya, you're probably right......but I know better.....
Thanks Roy, it was a great day with the 3 F's......family, food and fireworks.
